body_html: Yes, it should be part of the next release. We considered hiding the module. prefix in case of DataParallel, but concluded that we want to it behave like a regular module (to minimize the number of exceptions that both maintainers and users need to remember).
body_text: Yes, it should be part of the next release. We considered hiding the module. prefix in case of DataParallel, but concluded that we want to it behave like a regular module (to minimize the number of exceptions that both maintainers and users need to remember).
body: Yes, it should be part of the next release. We considered hiding the `module.` prefix in case of DataParallel, but concluded that we want to it behave like a regular module (to minimize the number of exceptions that both maintainers and users need to remember).
